programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1774
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep376
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: A House of Happiness
programme.desc: Uncle Shui suffers from Alzheimer's disease but still remembers his son and late wife. His caregiver Ha Gu leaves him as she cannot stand his bad temper. He then falls in love with a woman who looks like his late wife but has a hidden agenda. His neighbours try to seek help from Ha Gu and Shui’s son to make Shui see the truth about the newcomer.

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Angela arrives from another planet in search of her brother, fate has her unexpectedly meet handsome veterinarian Tian Yi, who risks himself to save her every time she gets into trouble. Though she is no believer of love, his actions eventually move her…

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi…

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong’s hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: The Spirit Of The Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot…

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Peng fought against many swordsmen and won, so he could not accept his first defeat and wanted to commit suicide. It is at this time that Peng meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader. They fall in love and want to get married. The Sect leader gives Peng the “Full Moon Scimitar” on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Lion Vs Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha’s “The Book and the Sword”. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Journey Of The Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by “Drunken Master”, this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun…

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan (Yuan Te) to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko (Chen Kuan-tai) she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Ko 2
programme.desc: Ko 2 revolves around a man who kidnaps the chief minister of the state and the mystery over why he does so.

programme.title: Fatukkottai Periyappa
programme.desc: Pichumani and Uma are about to get married when the wedding is stopped due to certain circumstances, creating a rift between the families. However, Pichumani's uncle decides to help them get married.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Yaamirukka Bayamey
programme.desc: Is a ghost haunting Kiran's ancestral property? Or is it a conman's master moves?

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.

programme.title: Nerkonda Paarvai
programme.desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: Kavya, a rich girl, goes to a restricted area in Andaman to celebrate the New Year with her friends. While evading the forest officers in the jungle, she knocks Jara, a tribal man, with her car.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Kalavani 2
programme.desc: Arivazhagan files his candidature for the panchayat elections hoping to profit from the two competing parties, comprising of his uncle and his lady-love's father.

programme.title: Maniyar Kudumbam
programme.desc: Kutti Maniyar, who belongs to a wealthy family, avoids working and lives off his inherited money and property. However, he decides to turn over a new leaf when he falls in love.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Cbi 5: The Brain
programme.desc: After a series of murders take place one after another, a police officer decides to investigate the case himself and bring the killer to justice.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Nagesh Thiraiarangam (2.5 Hrs)
programme.desc: Nagesh tries to make his ends meet by working as a real estate broker. He tries to sell his ancestral property for his sister's wedding but soon paranormal occurrences become a part of his life.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Podhuvaaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: A young man's dream to do good deeds for the upliftment of his village is interrupted by an influential man, who does not want anyone to grow above him.

programme.title: Mahasakthi Mariyammam
programme.desc: Goddess Parashakthi showers grace on famous poets and saints Ottakoothar and Sadasiva Brahmendra, her faithful devotees.

programme.title: Endrendum Punnagai
programme.desc: Three best friends, Gautham, Baby and Sri, decide to stay single all their lives. But Baby and Sri get married and Gautham is left alone until Priya comes into his life.

programme.title: Maapla Singam
programme.desc: Mapla Singam is a rural comedy about two families in a village that are in constant conflict with each other.

programme.title: Sowkarpet
programme.desc: The story is about two lovers who are murdered by villains. They come back as ghosts and start taking revenge on the people who killed them.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1

programme.title: What The Fish

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady Heron is a cultural blank slate when she first sets foot on the grounds of North Shore High School in a small town outside of Chicago, Illinois. After living in Africa, Cady has no idea how "wild" things can be in civilization until she crosses paths with one of the meanest species of all, the "Queen Bee," who at this school is the cool and calculating Regina George. But Cady doesn't just cross paths with this Queen Bee--she really stings her when she falls for Regina's ex-boyfriend Aaron Samuels. Now Regina is set to sting back by pretending to still like Aaron so he won't go out with Cady, all the while pretending to be her friend. With no choice but to use the same M.O. to stay in the game, the "Girl World" one-upmanship escalates until the entire school gets dragged into a first-class mean-fest.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: A sweeping epic of love, honor and obsession played out against the tumultuous backdrop of early 19th century France.

programme.title: The Greatest Show On Earth
programme.desc: Extravagant showman Cecil B. DeMille pulled out all the stops in this huge tribute to life under The Big Top. The plot involves thrilling circus acts, a spectacular train wreck and a breathtaking high wire act plus the trials of life on the road. Good old Hollywood entertainment - they don't make'em like this anymore. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Picture.

programme.desc: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Kill the Messenger - As the dust settles from the dispute, the Duttons deal with the potential repercussions. John calls in a favor and collects on some old debts. Jamie meets with the governor to do damage control.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: No Good Horses - The Duttons deal with a painful family anniversary. Kayce saves a young girl from danger. Jamie and Beth plan their respective political careers. Rainwater makes an ominous threat to the Dutton legacy.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Long Black Train - A secret about John comes to the surface. Beth shows Jenkins a rough night out. Quality time with Tate leads to a close call.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Coming Home - As Kayce feels the heat from tribal police, Jamie works some legal magic. Rip recruits a new cowboy for the ranch, and a beaten-down Jimmy begins to find some respect.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Remembering - A new partnership threatens John and the Yellowstone. Jamie ramps up his political campaign. Rip confronts Kayce about cleaning up his messes.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: A Monster Is Among Us - Rip stumbles upon a dangerous and dire situation. A plan is set in motion designed to squeeze John Dutton and threaten his way of life. Monica begins a tough recovery.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: The Unravelling: Part 1 - A Sherrif's investigation turns the heat up on Rip. Jamie makes a bold decision about his future and faces the consequences.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S1) Ep9

programme.desc: A Thundering - Kayce settles into his new role at the Ranch. A damaging article threatens to expose John. Rainwater pitches his new plan to the tribal council.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: New Beginnings - Kayce and Rip come to blows. Beth starts buying up land to protect the ranch. Monica begins a new chapter at the university.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: The Reek of Desperation - Rainwater teams up with Jenkins for a big business deal, but powerful new enemies look to block their plans. John and Beth groom a new political candidate.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Only Devils Left - John's enemies strike a direct hit on the Yellowstone. John forms an unlikely alliance. Kayce has his first day as a livestock officer.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Touching Your Enemy - Jamie tries desperately to walk back a previous mistake. Kayce tracks down evidence. Monica and Martin attend a traditional Indian horse relay.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Blood the Boy - John prepares to partner with a former pair of foes. Jamie makes a drastic move to protect the ranch. Jimmy takes a shot at a bull riding competition.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: Resurrection Day - Tensions escalate as the Beck brothers become frustrated by the Duttons' unwillingness to play ball. Jamie looks for a fresh start. Tate gets his first horse.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Behind Us Only - John and Rip seek revenge. Monica ponders the consequences of her living situation. Jimmy clears old debts.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep9
programme.desc: Enemies by Monday - The Duttons gear up for a final fight with the Becks, and find that the feud may have dire consequences. Beth helps Monica out of an uncomfortable situation.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Sins of the Father - The feud with the Becks comes to a head as the Duttons scramble to save one of their own.

programme.title: Out of Office
programme.desc: A wunderkind boss who, in an effort to ensure his staff's connectedness and productivity, asks them all to virtually interact and work face-to-face all day.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An ex-con drifter develops an unlikely friendship with a wealthy Dallas art dealer.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Galactic Barrier - Captain Burnham and her crew must go where few have gone before: beyond the Galactic Barrier. Meanwhile, Book learns the truth of what drives Ruon Tarka.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: The Reek of Desperation - Rainwater teams up with Jenkins for a big business deal, but powerful new enemies look to block their plans. John and Beth groom a new political candidate.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Only Devils Left - John's enemies strike a direct hit on the Yellowstone. John forms an unlikely alliance. Kayce has his first day as a livestock officer.

programme.title: FBI (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Apex - Maggie and Dana struggle to find justice for victims murdered by a serial killer who left a ghoulish mark on all of his victims, while the mayor limits the investigation to prevent economical loss.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep21
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Most Ridiculous (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Families - It's the funniest clip show about - and now it's families that are getting Most Ridiculous treatment. From goofy grandparents to disastrous dads, extreme sibling rivalry to mothers who don't know best.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: When an unidentified alien destroys three powerful Klingon cruisers, Captain James T. Kirk (William Shatner) returns to the newly transformed U.S.S. Enterprise™ to take command.

programme.title: The Night We Never Met
programme.desc: Brian doesn't want to give up his bachelor pad so he decides to share his small apartment with Ellen and Sam. The living arragenement works out well until Brian and Sam swap nights without telling Ellen.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep22
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery (S4) Ep11
programme.desc: Rosetta - While Captain Burnham leads an away mission to a planet that was once home to the aliens responsible for the DMA, Book and Tarka secretly infiltrate the U.S.S. Discovery.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: How Much Pain Can You Take? - To send a message to Pride, Baitfish murders someone close to the NCIS team, prompting a citywide manhunt for the elusive criminal. Dylan Walsh guest stars.

programme.title: A Royal Winter
programme.desc: While on a last-minute European holiday, a young woman finds herself in the middle of a real-life fairy tale when a chance meeting with a handsome local leads to something more.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: You're the Indian Now - John helps Tate overcome the torment of his captivity, while the Dutton's watch over their cattle away from the ranch. A new group of slick financiers threatens the Dutton's ranch.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Freight Trains and Monsters - The Duttons each in their own way adjust to their new settings. John continues bonding with his grandson in the bucolic setting. Beth meets the Duttons' new brash adversary.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: An Acceptable Surrender - John gives Tate some life advice on the pitfalls of being a rancher in the modern age. Newly appointed Attorney General Jamie concocts an alibi for his new defendant, and then begins witness tampering.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Going Back to Cali - Biker gangs add to threats the Duttons face. Beth escalates her fight against the financial adversary trying to take over their property, while John enlists Governor Perry's help.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Cowboys and Dreamers - While the Dutton's settle into their new roles, a nemesis from John's past appears. Beth continues her spat with Roarke, as his company threatens to buy up the Dutton's land.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: All for Nothing - An old Dutton nemesis returns to Yellowstone. Kayce and Monica assist Rainwater with a troubling situation. The financiers target the Dutton family unity.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Beating - Jamie stumbles upon unsettling news about his past, while Kayce tracks a cattle rustler. Beth joins forces with a lawyer to help stave off the corporate raiders closing in.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: I Killed a Man Today - Beth fires back against their financial adversary by shorting their stock, sending it plummeting. Monica assists authorities as missing person cases start mounting. Wade sends John Dutton a message.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Meaner Than Evil - A forgotten drifter returns to Yellowstone. Rattled by recent events, the ranchers seek revenge. The financiers plot their next move.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The World is Purple - Beth and Rip deliberate right and wrong, good and evil. The Duttons are forced into a tense standoff with their corporate nemesis. Thomas Rainwater receives some uncomfortable counsel.

programme.title: 1883 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Dutton family embarks on a journey west through the last bastion of untamed America. James arrives in Texas, where he and his family prepare to make their way through The Great Plains in search of a new home and the promise of opportunity.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre
programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brother’s mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brother’s death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?

programme.title: A Perfect Fit
programme.desc: A big city lawyer with impossible standards, Katharina is sure that carpenter Mike is not the one for her. Though Mike does not meet any of her criteria, there seems to be an unexplainable spark between the unlikely couple.

programme.title: The Test
programme.desc: A school principal decides to siphon school funds to rebuild his house after a flood. But when he realizes that his students and teachers are hit just as hard as him, he begins to rethink his choice.

programme.title: Murder In Tours
programme.desc: A controversial sculptor is found murdered beside one of his artworks, which has been vandalized with Latin inscriptions. Commander Louise works with her son Sylvain to decode the crime; the clues lead them to disturbing truths about the artist’s works.

programme.title: Men Do What They Can
programme.desc: Paul is a bachelor and a charming womanizer. But his life takes an abrupt turn when he falls deeply in love with Iris, an engaged woman. With the help of his best guy pals and his Rottweiler dog, he goes all out to woo her with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: Acasa, My Home
programme.desc: For 20 years, the Enache family has been living in the Bucharest Delta in harmony with nature. When the nine children and their parents are evicted from their home, they are forced to adapt to life in the big city.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: The Night Guard
programme.desc: Salvador, a security guard working the night shift in Mexico City, attempts to leave his workplace to attend an important engagement elsewhere. When questioned by police about a case, he tells a white lie that soon escalates into dramatic consequences.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre
programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brother’s mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brother’s death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: Acasa, My Home
programme.desc: For 20 years, the Enache family has been living in the Bucharest Delta in harmony with nature. When the nine children and their parents are evicted from their home, they are forced to adapt to life in the big city.

programme.title: Zurich
programme.desc: Nina roams the highways of Europe in a desperate attempt to forget her past. She decides to join a German driver on his journey, but it becomes clear that Nina’s behaviour stems from her pain due to a past betrayal.

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Young, Blonde & Dead
programme.desc: When the mutilated bodies of three girls are found, police affirm that a serial killer is on the loose. As part of investigations, Inspector Julia enters the world of the rich and mighty – where the killer might be closer to her than she’d ever imagine.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: It's Your Turn, Honey!
programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: DNA Episode 1
programme.desc: When a little girl disappears in Copenhagen, forensic clues point to a kidnapper in Poland. Inspector Rolf travels there with an unlikely partner – his baby daughter. But tragedy strikes when his daughter suddenly disappears from her pram on the ferry.

programme.title: DNA Episode 2
programme.desc: Inspector Rolf tries to find a car thief by matching DNA to possible suspects. His assistant Neel discovers that the thief isn’t on the registry and this prompts Rolf to reflect on the unsolved disappearance of his own baby daughter 5 years ago.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Balancing Act
programme.desc: Marie has it all – a loving family and a successful career. However, her world comes crashing when she’s diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. As she struggles to come to terms with the trauma, she learns to accept help from others and find the silver lining.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 9
programme.desc: The score of a lifetime is hidden in the back of what already appears to be a great locker, but when the bidding heats up, will our auction heroes have the cash to stay in this game? But first, Brandon and Lori face a shocking discovery when the contents of what look like an old retail store reveal their true identity. And later, some rare antiques fetch a fair price but further exploration of a hidden whale tusk could mean a windfall for one lucky storage hunter.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 1
programme.desc: Old rivals unite when Brandon and Jesse are faced with the unthinkable: join forces or stand alone to gamble on a once-in-a-lifetime locker. Then, a vintage motorcycle and rare car parts create big cash for one of our slickest auction heroes. And later, the Taylor Brothers are in for the fight of their lives when they leave the Deep South for the promise of California gold. It's an old-world battle that could lead to a new world order.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 7
programme.desc: Clark struggles to help Jordan who is grappling with a new power. Meanwhile, Lois enlists Clark’s help which leads to a surprise encounter. Arrow’s DAVID RAMSEY directs.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 8
programme.desc: Clark encourages Lois to reach out for help after noticing her reaching a breaking point. Meanwhile, Jonathan finds himself in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 9
programme.desc: Lois, Chrissy and Clark team up to piece together the significance of Smallville to Morgan Edge.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 5
programme.desc: With the girls away in Vegas for the weekend, the guys try to invent "the next big thing," but only come up with new ways to procrastinate.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 6
programme.desc: Sheldon and Raj see if they can survive intense heat - and each other - when they venture deep underground in the name of science.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 7
programme.desc: When the gang recreates a high-school prom night on the roof of the guys' apartment building, Sheldon feels pressure to participate in all the typical romantic traditions.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 8
programme.desc: The guys try to help Penny out of an awkward work dilemma, when a smitten doctor shows up at her door after her flirtatious sales techniques work a little too well.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 9
programme.desc: When Leonard gets minor surgery on his nose, Sheldon has a major overreaction. Meanwhile Howard and Bernadette work on their marriage in light of Raj's parents' impending divorce.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 02
programme.desc: Lisbon goes undercover in prison to bust a car theft ring.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: Friends S7 9
programme.desc: Monica becomes popular with her neighbors because of her homemade candy. Phoebe decides to learn to ride a bicycle. Rachel gets into trouble for dating her assistant.

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: Are you brave enough to take the next step? The escaped convict Nick Cassidy is suddenly standing high up on a ledge of a skyscraper in New York City. Will he jump? In no-time, Nick has captured the attention of the whole city and all media.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: Jason Statham stars as FBI agent Jack Crawford, who vows to track down the infamous assassin ‘Rogue’ (Jet Li), so that he can personally avenge his partner’s death.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 6
programme.desc: In an ice cream shop, Michael whips up a mind-boggling app at a party store, he spills the tea on a self-brewing decoration and at a farm, Michael's helper looks like he saw a ghost after a run-in with a spirited scarecrow.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 7
programme.desc: At a cooking class, Michael gets crabby when chopping salad and brings the heat to instantly cook a meatball with his breath. And later, Michael chills his assistant to her bones when a cryotherapy experiment freezes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 8
programme.desc: Michael explores the true depth of a deep-dish pizza, and later, he plays doctor to a patient questioning his own vision and sanity. Plus, as a locksmith, Michael stuns his assistant with a surprise on the other side of the door.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 9
programme.desc: Michael gives a confused woman the license to speed at the DMV, unclogs a "crumby" toaster at a return counter, and blows the mind of a beach attendant with a scaly encounter from under the sea!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 10
programme.desc: Michael schools a man on fish fossil breeding at a rock store and colors with his tongue at a paint store. Then, on a construction site, Michael and his helper dig up a skeleton that still has some life in it.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 03
programme.desc: Jane (series star SIMON BAKER) must work with a familiar adversary, femme fatale Erica Flynn (returning guest star MORENA BACCARIN) during a dangerous mission in Beirut.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 1
programme.desc: In the final season premiere, Jane tries to pick up the pieces after the explosive finale in Iceland. She then plans a rescue mission to free Rich Dotcom from a CIA blacksite.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 2
programme.desc: Jane and the team reach out to Patterson's father, Bill Nye, in the hopes of gaining access to a high-level conference in Finland where they hope to bring Matthew Weitz to their side.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 3
programme.desc: When an op goes bad, the team must deal with the monster in the room. Meanwhile, Weitz is forced into a game of psychological chess with Madeline.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 4
programme.desc: In order to stop a terrorist group from procuring a deadly chemical weapon, the team must remember key details from their first days at the FBI.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 5
programme.desc: When Jane is shot and Weller kidnapped, the team must fight to save both of their lives while Weller is haunted by some dark ghosts from the past.

The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

Then, seasoned local Victor throws down his bankroll for a trove of luxury goods, but are they actually knock-offs? And later, Brandon and Lori think they've hit the jackpot with a cache of firearms, but when Lori's gun accidentally goes off inside the locker, Brandon is caught in the crosshairs.

And later, the contents of a unit spark an outrage among the buyers, but Brandon only sees dollar signs. Will he walk away or will this controversial cache crush his morals?

programme.title: 10,000 Bc
programme.desc: In a remote mountain tribe, the young hunter D'Leh (Steven Strait-The Covenant) has found his heart's passion, the beautiful Evolet (Camilla Belle-When a Stranger Calls). But when mysterious warlords kidnap Evolet, D'Leh leads a small group of hunters to the end of the world to save her - battling prehistoric predators, braving the harshest elements and learning their ultimate fate lies in an empire beyond imagination, where great pyramids reach into the skies. Here they will take their stand against a tyrannical god. And it is here that D'Leh finally comes to understand that he has been called to save not only Evolet but all of civilization.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people - and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 7

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep183
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

The ASC Archive will be a compilation of the deep conservations about the guests' albums, the diverse requests they carry out, as well as TMIs from behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep2
programme.desc: Daddy Issues - McGee’s personal life and professional life intersect when a dad from his children’s school is linked to a break-in at a government storage bunker

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep3
programme.desc: Unearth - When a dead body is found at an ancient burial site that is thought to be cursed, the team tries to determine the motive and the symbolism behind the crime.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep4
programme.desc: Leave No Trace - Agent Knight’s past resurfaces when her ex-boyfriend, a National Parks Service agent, teams up with NCIS to investigate a campsite murder.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep5
programme.desc: Guardian - Agent Parker steps up to protect Director Vance after a terrifying home invasion. Also, the team detects advancements in Jessica and Jimmy’s blossoming romance.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep6
programme.desc: The Good Fighter - When an NCIS agent turns up dead and Kasie goes unaccounted for, the team must work quickly to find the killer.

programme.desc: Tiny Problems - When Jack is disappointed with the popcorn maker he orders, he and the students plot revenge; Helen goes back to school to get her high school degree and chaos ensues in Principal Durbin's office in her absence.

programme.desc: Disgraced - Mr. Pugh plans a field trip for the Toledo chapter of the Ohio Naturalists; when Jack can't write his own book, he agrees to be ghostwrite for popular author Robin Shwank -- only to insert his own chapters into Shwank's book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Gary Meets Dave - Jack accidentally loses a significant amount of money and it falls in the hands of the students; as Principal Durbin and Helen investigate who stole the money, the students and teachers admit to other wrongdoings.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Get Hoppy - Principle Durbin turns into a power-hungry maniac after self-publishing Jack's philosophy book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mr. Pistachio - Jack has Mary drive him to the doctor, but a prank results in him getting the same procedure twice; at school, Durbin and Helen embarrass themselves and the kids compete over class superlative titles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep6
programme.desc: That That That - As the school prepares for winter break, Jack tries to record a lecture as a way into the University of Wisconsin's philosophy department; frustrated and unable to finish the video, he falls asleep and has nightmares.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Aces Wild - Helen has a vaping problem to overcome with the help of Durbin while Anthony's secret is revealed.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep8

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Tornado! - A tornado puts the school on lockdown and Helen believes it's coming specifically for her. The kids pass the time by writing fan fiction, "shipping" various combinations of faculty members.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweatpants - Jack has the students form a fake cult to sabotage Principal Durbin's new school uniforms. Mary, Stef and Michelle prepare to see one of their favorite artists who is in town to perform.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep3
programme.desc: An Oath To Rusty - Jack attempts to get closer with the guys at work by inviting them over for a game night. Helen helps Principal Durbin grow a backbone. Stef and Mary try to coax information out of Michelle about a court case.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Tons Of Rue - When the A.P. Bio students reunite Jack with his deadbeat dad, Jack plots revenge by trying to expose his allegedly reformed father. A witch foretells of a grim future for Mary, Stef and Michelle that divides the women.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep5
programme.desc: The Perfect Date From Hell - When Jack discovers his new girlfriend's therapy homework requires dating him, he turns the tables on her. Principal Durbin goes undercover to determine which faculty member is most worthy of a very special prize.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Love, For Lack Of A Better Term - Victor attempts to catch up to his peers and become a man by sending Ashlanda a risqué photo. Grace and Anthony try to "Parent Trap" Mary and Principal Durbin after overhearing a conversation on single adults.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Malachi - When Jack's girlfriend says she's going to dinner with a male friend, a jealous Jack tags along. Principal Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle take Helen out to cheer her up after a breakup.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Harvard Pen - Jack is enraged to find that the A.P. Bio students have stolen his beloved Harvard pen after he asked them not to touch it. Principal Durbin and Helen repeatedly fail the superintendent's inspections.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep1
programme.desc: A Family Matter - Special Agent Alden Parker is still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, so the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep2
programme.desc: Daddy Issues - McGee’s personal life and professional life intersect when a dad from his children’s school is linked to a break-in at a government storage bunker

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep3
programme.desc: Unearth - When a dead body is found at an ancient burial site that is thought to be cursed, the team tries to determine the motive and the symbolism behind the crime.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep4
programme.desc: Leave No Trace - Agent Knight’s past resurfaces when her ex-boyfriend, a National Parks Service agent, teams up with NCIS to investigate a campsite murder.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep5
programme.desc: Guardian - Agent Parker steps up to protect Director Vance after a terrifying home invasion. Also, the team detects advancements in Jessica and Jimmy’s blossoming romance.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep6
programme.desc: The Good Fighter - When an NCIS agent turns up dead and Kasie goes unaccounted for, the team must work quickly to find the killer.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep7
programme.desc: Love Lost - NCIS must investigate the Secretary of the Navy when her husband claims she tried to murder him.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep8
programme.desc: NCIS is more than just an action drama. With liberal doses of humor, it's a show that focuses on the sometimes complex and always amusing dynamics of a team forced to work together in high-stress situations.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep2

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Frozen Peaks - Found on every continent, mountains create unique frozen worlds, home to extraordinary animals that must overcome the crushing conditions of the cold.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Frozen South - Antarctica is the most hostile of all Earth's frozen worlds. Yet even here, life finds a way not just to survive but to thrive.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep5

programme.desc: Our Frozen Planet - Our frozen planet is changing. In this final episode we meet the scientists dedicating their lives to understanding what these changes mean, not just for animals and people who live there, but for the planet as a whole.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep15
programme.desc: See the mass production of curly fries, plus red velvet cakes with cream cheese frosting, vegetable pot pies, and marshmallow squares covered in vanilla caramel.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Fish fingers are covered with batter and bread crumbs; puffed corn meal is coated with caramel; creating crinkle-cut sweet potato fries; and cookie dough batter is frozen, then smothered in chocolate.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heart of The Dragon - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the people of China from January to April as the Chinese concept of 24 solar terms is explained. After Chinese New Year we witness a stunning Lantern Festival in Nanjing.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Expedition Unseen - Steve takes on four entirely new adventures to remote parts of the planet - including Saudi Arabia, Gabon and Mexico - in search of precious natural wonders.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Louisiana - Robson is in America's deep south on the Tennessee River where he catches catfish in his hands. Then he's off to the Gulf of Mexico for blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Madagascar in Cold Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the lives of Madagascar’s cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Madagascar in Cold Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the lives of Madagascar’s cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Here Comes the Rain Ep6
programme.desc: Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.
