programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep13
programme.desc: Crimson And Clover - Clover's wild, party-girl twin sister Crimson visits and King Julien is instantly smitten.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep14

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep15
programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18

programme.desc: Hawaii Five No/Story Of J.J.E.F.F - The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep77

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep78

programme.desc: Three Trolls-Keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh/Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep49
programme.desc: Twintuition - When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert & The Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert & The Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out… with spectacular results.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep1
programme.desc: Fang Decay / Scare Day - Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep12
programme.desc: Collection And Extraction - Team Voltron infiltrates a hidden Galra Space Station to investigate why Zarkon is attacking planets and siphoning the life energy from the universe

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep12
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Three - Bullwinkle and Rocky fly to a mysterious monster-inhabited island to meet the missing mad scientist that created the serum that turned Bullwinkle into a monster, only to learn of the biggest, meanest monster on the island, Humongalon

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Don'T Worry Be Peppy / Two'S A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side Of The Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap To The Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As she’s preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future – and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out there’s a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do The Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesn’t think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggie’s big moment going.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting The Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower For Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier'S Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills…/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Troll’s fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast And The Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Queen Of The Castle/Truth Or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Apple Of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch A Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Cj Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/Bfff - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each other’s point of view. /When Branch decides it’s time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods/Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep51
programme.desc: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2 - An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep52
programme.desc: 137 Hours/Stalks On A Plane - Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep53
programme.desc: The Strife Aquatic - After fleeing the kingdom, King Julien and Maurice discover an unwanted visitor; Sage takes Clover to meet his master; Koto makes everyone his slave

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep54
programme.desc: The Most Eggcellent Adventure - King Julien and Maurice arrive on an island full of lady lemurs; Sage and Clover pick out Clover's “emotional support hawk”; Mort gains intel on Koto

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep51
programme.desc: The Obelisk - When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep52
programme.desc: The Bloodwolf - When Puss is dealing with the apparent loss of Dulcinea, the mighty fear-eating Bloodwolf arrives and brings out Puss's greatest fears

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep52
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 2 - An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep13
programme.desc: The Black Paladin - Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.desc: Chicken At Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.desc: Coral Dilemma - When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddingtons Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist - Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Pups Bark with Dinosaurs - The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep709
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Sore Dino / Dino Rescue: Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs - In the Dino Wilds, Marshall performs some dino dentistry with the help of an ancient geyser and his fellow Dino Pup pals. // Francois and Cap'n Turbot are in Dino wilds for an adventure but a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a dino ride!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Hum-Dino - Mayor Humdinger takes his Kitties to the Dino Wilds for some dino acting lessons, but instead finds himself on top of a runaway Brachiosaurus bound for Adventure Bay! Now it's up to the pups to save the town before the dino stomps all over it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep707
programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups Save a Pterodactyl / Dino Rescue: Pups and the Big Rumble - When Maverick the daredevil Pterodactyl takes a tumble and hurts his wing, the pups are there for a sky high Dino Rescue! // A volcano is erupting, threatening the Dino Wilds! It's all paws on deck for a massive Dino Rescue!

programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Project Loud House / In Tents Debate - Lincoln has to get to school on time but getting his sisters out the door proves to be the biggest obstacle of all. // Lincoln is the deciding vote on going to the beach or the amusement park for their family vacation.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Sound of Silence / Space Invader - Lincoln buys a pair sound-canceling ear buds to drown out the sound of his sisters. // After Lynn and Lucy get in a fight, Lincoln agrees to let Lynn bunk in his room but only for a night!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep122
programme.desc: Chum Bucket Supreme / Single Cell Anniversary - Plankton hires Patrick to create advertising slogans for the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob helps Plankton find the perfect anniversary gift for Karen.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep125
programme.desc: Pineapple Fever / Chum Caverns - Squidward gets stuck indoors with SpongeBob and Patrick during a storm. // Plankton creates an underground restaurant that threatens to put the Krusty Krab out of business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep198
programme.desc: Sharks vs. Pods - "The Sharks" are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much for SpongeBob to handle.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lost in Couch / Pat-a-thon - Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Much Ado About Noshing / Broadcast Blues - The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynn's Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Camped! - When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. // They soon uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it and prove the existence of an old camp legend.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep185
programme.desc: It Came From Goo Lagoon - A giant goo bubble emerges from Goo Lagoon and threatens all of Bikini Bottom--except for Plankton, who plans to use the bubble for his own evil ends.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep109
programme.desc: Boating Buddies / The Krabby Kronicle - In an attempt to get away from SpongeBob, Squidward drives off in his boat as fast as he can, but he is pulled over and ordered to go to boating school. // Mr. Krabs decides to go into the tabloid business.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep201

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Small Island Big Song: An Oceanic Songline
programme.desc: This grassroots musical follows the ocean highways uniting ancient musical lineages. A heartfelt plea for environmental awareness and cultural preservation from those on the frontline of the climate crisis.

programme.title: New Year's Eve 2022 Ep1
programme.desc: NYE Celebrations kick off with The Early Night Show hosted by Rhys Nicholson, Casey Donovan, Gemma Driscoll and a swag of surprise guests. Bringing all the family-friendly fun in the lead up to 9pm Calling Country Fireworks.

programme.title: New Year's Eve 2022 Ep2
programme.desc: Light up the night with the 9pm Calling Country Fireworks, part of NYE Celebrations from Sydney Harbour.

programme.title: New Year's Eve 2022 Ep3
programme.desc: The perfect soundtrack for your NYE. A stellar line-up of Tones and I, Ball Park Music, Vika & Linda, Dami Im, Morgan Evans, Casey Donovan, Electric Fields, Courtney Act and Tasman Keith showcase unforgettable performances.

programme.title: New Year's Eve 2022 Ep4
programme.desc: The whole world will be watching as more than a million revellers return to the Sydney Harbour foreshore to ring in the new year with a concert and fireworks celebration starring an incredible list of Australian artists.

programme.title: New Year's Eve 2022 Ep5
programme.desc: As the clock strikes midnight the world-famous Sydney Fireworks display will light up the night in a show stopping presentation as we farewell 2022.

programme.title: New Year's Eve 2022 Ep6
programme.desc: The perfect end to a magical night as we conclude an unforgettable NYE celebration with a beautiful rendition of the timeless classic Auld Lang Syne.

programme.title: Y2K: The Bug That Didn't Bite
programme.desc: 23 years ago the world overcame the Y2K crisis. John Barron looks at how Australia beat the millennium bug, a global panic over fears our computer systems would meltdown when the date hit 1/1/2000.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.desc: We look back over Leigh Sales' 12 years as host of 7.30 including her most memorable interviews with some of the world's most powerful and famous figures, plus never-before-seen footage from behind the scenes.

programme.title: 8 Billion People And Counting
programme.desc: The global population has now exceeded 8 billion people. In an ABC News Special Casey Briggs breaks down the facts and figures, looking at how we got here and the issues and opportunities of population growth ahead.

programme.desc: The Gardening Australia team prepare for summer in the garden. Costa visits a miniature garden; herbs to take on holiday; what to plant in January; we revisit the Karen refugee vegetable garden.

programme.desc: In 1939 PM Menzies launched Australia's first international broadcast service Australia Calling. For more than 80 Years ABC has delivered an Australian perspective on the culture and events of the Asia Pacific.

programme.desc: Cate Campbell, Georgina Long and Richard Scolyer speak about the melanoma crisis in a Press Club event 'Game On Mole - urgent action required to tackle melanoma, which claims more Australian lives than our annual road toll'.

programme.title: Fault Lines 2022
programme.desc: We thought we'd beaten COVID, until war and economic strife, protest and authoritarianism reminded us how rapidly things can change in a connected world. War, inflation and an unfolding climate crisis sets the scene for 2023.

programme.title: The World In 2022 - Asia Pacific
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor looks at the big stories that shaped our region in 2022. From the Hunga Tonga eruption, to the assassination of Shinzo Abe, and China's push for power in the Pacific - the region has changed forever.

programme.title: Y2K: The Bug That Didn't Bite
programme.desc: 23 years ago the world overcame the Y2K crisis. John Barron looks at how Australia beat the millennium bug, a global panic over fears our computer systems would meltdown when the date hit 1/1/2000.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart sets course for Port Campbell on Victoria's Shipwreck Coast, known for its wild weather and dangerous seas.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep17
programme.desc: The ABC News Video Lab explains the events and issues making news in Australia and around the world. In this episode the Earth's population passes 8 billion people, plus the ACT decriminalises hard drugs.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep1
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Michael Rowland and Nour Haydar bring you the latest overnight developments plus news and interviews, Michael Rennie with sport, and Emma Rebellato with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep1
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Joe O'Brien in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep1
programme.desc: Dan Bourchier brings you the latest news and today's top stories. Right around Australia, in the Pacific and around the world ABC News has reporters on the ground covering news as it unfolds and the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 30 - Jane Edmanson goes farming on Lord Howe Island, Millie Ross discovers the secret lives of sunflowers, Tino Carnevale offers solutions for sloping gardens, and Josh Byrne plants semi-tropical edibles on his sunny deck area.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rookie Dan returns to Coober Pedy a new Dad and newly determined to find more white opal. Col's Crew raise the stakes forking out thousands of dollars on an ancient and dangerous exploration drill rig.

programme.title: Next Gen Agriculture Ep1
programme.desc: Twenty years ago rural leaders were alarmed by young people's perceived declining interest in rural jobs and lives. But as this episode of Landline's Next Gen Agriculture series shows, it's a different story now.

programme.title: Small Island Big Song: An Oceanic Songline
programme.desc: This grassroots musical follows the ocean highways uniting ancient musical lineages. A heartfelt plea for environmental awareness and cultural preservation from those on the frontline of the climate crisis.

programme.title: ABC News Summer Ep1
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep17
programme.desc: The ABC News Video Lab explains the events and issues making news in Australia and around the world. In this episode the Earth's population passes 8 billion people, plus the ACT decriminalises hard drugs.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep1
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep1
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the day's events from reporters in more locations across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep1
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. We have reporters on the ground following the story and the issues that matter.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart sets course for Port Campbell on Victoria's Shipwreck Coast, known for its wild weather and dangerous seas.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep1
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter to you. With a network of reporters across Australia and around the globe we uncover important stories and news as it unfolds.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep16
programme.desc: Did you know that a few beers with friends could actually be considered a funeral? Step inside the revolutionary not-for-profit funeral service that's saving people thousands.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep1
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest news and the best coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Plus breaking news and live reports.

programme.title: Rosie Batty's One Plus One Ep5
programme.desc: Frances Rings is about to take the reins at Bangarra, Australia's leading Indigenous dance company. The choreographer tells Rosie Batty about family, connecting with culture and the pressures and opportunities of leadership.

programme.title: The World Ep1
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep12
programme.desc: Forced into exile 36 years ago, the Marcos dynasty is poised to take power again in the Philippines. The son of dictator Ferdinand Sr, Bongbong, is much loved - but how has the family restored its tarnished reputation?

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep1
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you full coverage of today's news from reporters on the ground to explain what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Briana Shepherd.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep24
programme.desc: The race to make psychedelic drugs part of mainstream medicine. Elise Worthington looks into clinical trials to treat trauma, PTSD and mental health conditions, plus the dark side of abuse, malpractice and underground supply.

programme.desc: Sr. 2 - We meet the head of Tonga's national broadcaster and learn how she and her team kept life-saving information going out on the airwaves as Tonga faced a devastating triple disaster.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time Scoop Hunter
programme.desc: In the Edo period, yureki-sanka traveled Japan teaching math to the common people. Two such teachers find themselves in a battle of wits, with the leadership of a village math school at stake.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Hanami, Kyoto's cherry viewing festivities in the spring. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reuniting To Run
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji's Ultra-Trail race was back on track in April of 2022 after a two-year pandemic hiatus. Join us to witness the drama of runners pushing their limits in the beautiful setting of Mt. Fuji.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A fishing cooperative in southeastern Japan has been operating for over 100 years. Its salary system brings in fishers from other regions, but many soon leave. What must the coop do to survive?

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #5 I studied by listening to the radio. / Explain how you learned Japanese by putting "de" after the method you used. For example, "rajio de", meaning "by listening to the radio".

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Raden, the iridescent sheen of Kyoto craftwork. Dive deep into the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: In a deep mountain valley near the Jozankei hot spring resorts, two fishermen searching for large char traverse past waterfalls towards the headwaters and catch the illusory fish as beautiful as gems!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: 84-year-old Ueno Toshio has been a traffic guard for 25 years. He directs cars and pedestrians safely with deft precision and a human touch. But the pride he has in his job has been hard-won.

programme.title: Doki Doki! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Anime Supernova" showing Yano Honami who has been a creator to watch out for. The way she implements new techniques in each work has garnered critical acclaim worldwide.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Rising
programme.desc: Discover a unique app that uses AI to support Japan's fisheries workers by predicting the most fertile fishing grounds, and gathering data for the sustainable management of fragile fish stocks.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-16.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at kotatsu: traditional heated tables.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Meet kitties in an alleyway in hilly Nagasaki, see a white kitty relax and hunt around Peace Park, and enjoy kitty heaven at Unzen Jigoku hot springs before noisy humans arrive.

programme.title: Somewhere Street

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep1
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
